TopicTitle: Give me ideas for a challenge you want me to do?

Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm looking for ideas from users/people for a challenge you want me to do since in having some trouble with my other ones. Share your ideas below! I do the one that fits me best.

Im looking for some good ideas.

Edited March 29, 2019 by Johnster_Space_Program
Design a craft that launches from Eve sea-level to orbit, de-orbits and lands (anywhere) and then re-orbits.
It's not exactly "your" next challenge if one of us comes up with it for you, is it?

Moved to Challenges and Mission Ideas because it's a request for a challenge.

How about Cooking a nice meal for a loved one?  Just kidding, a Jool 5 mission can be fun.

35 minutes ago, Loskene said:

It's not exactly "your" next challenge if one of us comes up with it for you, is it?

yes, I guess that's true, guess I should rename this

I proposed one in another simjlar thread recently, where the author gave a rough estimate of what he is comfortable with.

This place is full of nice challenges like K-Prize, Jool-5, or even STS. Have you tried them? What kind of missions do you expect?

If you feel brave, try this one: Build a rocket that

A) launches from Kerbin

B) lands at Duna (1)

C) returns to Kerbin(1)

D) lands on Duna (2)

E) returns to Kerbin (2)

F) lands on Duna (3)

G) returns to Kerbin (3)

Rules: No refueling, no mods (info screens are ok). Bring a Kerbal to plant flags. Staging allowed.

It's possible, you can find it on Youtube.

If you want a fast and loose 'challenge', try and see how close you can get to the sun, without burning up. It's something you can also try over and over again to beat yourself. Will keep you occupied for a little bit.
